zhcn_desc:
§E§H合金§!（£alloys£）是高级资源，一般用于军事领域，可用来生产§H舰船§!和§H恒星基地§!。可通过以下方式获取更多的合金：
§Y1.§!在已殖民星球的地表建设 £building£ §H合金铸造厂§!建筑。
§Y2.§!在已殖民星球的地表建设 £district£ §H工业区划§!。
§Y3.§!在§H贸易市场§!购买。§!
en_desc:
§E§HAlloys§! (£alloys£) are advanced resources with a military application, which we need to construct §HShips§! and §HStarbases§!. We can gain more by:
§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HAlloy Foundries§! buildings on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y2.§! Building £district£ §HIndustrial Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y3.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!
